message:
有熟悉台灣「遊說法」現況及實務運作的學者、NGO、政治工作者願意接受 Sunlight Foundation 的採訪嗎？意者請留言或 email clkao {at} clkao.org
據說台、美、加是最先有遊說法的國家，因此上週在華盛頓的 Sunlight 辦公室被抓包，問我可否幫忙找到比較了解這方面的人。採訪的內容與報導都會以公開授權釋出。這是一系列由 google.org 資助的採訪報導，之前的加拿大相關報導在此：http://sunlightfoundation.com/blog/2014/05/05/transparency-case-study-lobbying-disclosure-in-canada/
story: Chia-liang Kao shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: We are proud to release the fourth case in our ongoing research project studying technology-enabled transparency policies around the world. We have chosen to focus on lobbying disclosure policies and online lobbying registries for our second set of cases. Read our previous cases, and find out what i…
name: Transparency Case Study: Lobbying disclosure in Canada
caption: sunlightfoundation.com
